page.title: 19The Mayor of Sutton on Sea.
page.content: The Mayor of Sutton and Mablethorpe now is{Mrs P.Ash}but when we started this survey it was Mr J.Bromwich.He became Mayor because he had been on the Council for a long time.People used to call him "Mr.Mayor" which was embarrasing.He has a greengrocery shop and sometimes it was hard to run the shop as well as be Mayor.He has been to lots of dinners but made only 2 speeches.He has not changed much while he was Mayor but he managed to get lights on the promenade and the colonnade painted.He also helped raise Â£500 for the swimming pool fund.He think the people in Sutton are very friendly.He has lived here for l6 years.He likes it her because it is quiet but he does not like the vandals.His job involves being chairman of the Town Council.His chain is made of gold and is very heavy.
